extends AbstractAction

getLuminance

public static int getLuminance(Color color)
Compute (and return) the luminance of a given color, the luminance is used in the ChangeBackgroundColor action, Color action and ChangeLCDColor action.
Luminance is computed using Y = 0,299 R + 0,587 G + 0,114 B formula.

Parameters:
color - The color we want the luminance.
Returns:
The luminance of the given color.
